attributes.action: to award the troops south atlanitc medal without rosette for service in the falklands after the 1982 conflict
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many sevice men and women including members of the T A served in the falklands in the aftermathe  of the conflict to ensure peace in the falkland islands conditions were very difficult and many service men / women were injured in the 18/24 months after the conflict, these people deserve a medal to show that they to served in a emegancy tour of duty with little or no complaint, many service personel had repeted tours within 18 months.,
